comment.author: 7713623@N08
comment._content: Major Bell had a 50,000 acre farm near Indian Head, Saskatchewan in the 1880s. See the following link, esask.uregina.ca/entry/indian_head.html. See also www.bellbarn.ca/history.php I understand the round barn on the Bell farm existed until very recently. The heritage community is raising funds to rebuild it.

comment.author: 25786829@N08
comment._content:
Thank you for your valuable comment. Changes to the title were made.
The McCord Museum team
